channel.title: I got a problem
channel.description: When I try to make TRIMMED skill capes shop, I always get a connection lost or my client freezes when I trade to the "shop guy". I'v added some other shops same way, but this one just doesn't work. And yes, I do use silabsoft client.

item.title: I got a problem
item.dc:creator: @Eleret Eleret
item.description:
@Eleret wrote:

It does have silabs and I do use silabs. Every other silab item works when it’s in shop, helm of neiti, gses etc. But Trimmed skill capes don’t.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 15, 2008, 06:58:24 AM[/size][hr][quote=“Eleret”]It does have silabs and I do use silabs. Every other silab item works when it’s in shop, helm of neiti, gses etc. But Trimmed skill capes don’t.[/quote]
Help?

Read full topic

item.description:

does your server have silabs???

dont use the moparscape client to silab servers because the client doesint have it so it freezes
